channel.title: 3 THINGS
channel.description: 3Things is an absolutely avid, perfectly pleasurable, unilaterally universal, and delightfully delicious bit of fluff designed to make one think a bit, laugh a little, and perhaps learn a thing or three. It is lovingly writerated, producimatised, and hostermationed by the lovely and talented C. Jenna. Please, enjoy. And, if you feel so inclined, you may certainly feel free to add a bit to the old tip jar so our dear Jenna doesn't have to decide between bandwidth costs and new mud-chinking in the walls of her little mud hut. I would love to thank you personally on the next 'cast, should you decide to be so kind as to tip, so when you do, don't forget to mention your name! Mucho apreciado for listening!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Something cosmic, something galactic, something bluddy universal!
channel.itunes:author: C. Jenna

And, if you feel so inclined, you may certainly feel free to add a bit to the old tip jar so our dear Jenna doesn't have to decide between bandwidth costs and new mud-chinking in the walls of her little mud hut. I would love to thank you personally on the next 'cast, should you decide to be so kind as to tip, so when you do, don't forget to mention your name! Mucho apreciado for listening!

item.title: Bionic Sister
item.description: Hey! Hi... hello. Welcome to 3Things. Today, HEAR some REAL THINGS from your hostess, C. Jenna. That's it, "ah ain't sayin' no more." Comments? Q's? Leave them HERE. Well, leave them with the links over there, to your right.. ya, that's the place.

item.title: trois dinge número otto (3Things Number Eight)
item.description: Hey! It's Jenna again, with some things. Imagine that! This week, Badbad 'mercanz... a bit of an obsession I just DON'T get... and I decapitate a "monster". You just can't beat that with a big ol' stick. Welcome to my world, won't you come on in? (pssssst! Check the links and leave me a note.)
item.dc:creator: C. Jenna

item.title: Three And One Extra
item.description: So, yeah. Episode #30. This is it! Ice, planets, planes and ancient heffalumps. Wanna know what the heck I'm talking about? Then come on in and have a seat and find out! Then, once you know... let me know what you think! Comments are easilyleavable... you should SO do it!

item.title: 3Things Special Edition with Chao
item.description: 3THINGS SPECIAL EDITION featuring the musical stylings of CHAO MUSIC Find A Hole -Chao POEM Perfect World -C. Jenna MUSIC Country Song - Chao MUSIC Roll Me - Chao POEM Snapshot - C. Jenna MUSIC Lay Lady Lay - Chao POEM Just High - C. Jenna MUSIC This Love Is Dead - Chao A rendition of Juvenile's "Slow Motion", by Jedarra MUSIC Something For Joey - Chao

item.title: Cheers, Jeers and a Smart Ass
item.description: Young and Dummies, Slippery Crooks, Victorious Elderly Females, and a truly intelligent Ass. You just can't beat these 3Things with a stick. Give a listen and find out! Comments? LEAVE EM HERE. Questions? SAM TING!

item.title: A New Old Slice
item.description: Rantin'n'ravin', debunkerizing, and punishments that seem to fit. Wanna know what I'm talkin' about? Then click that little *play* button down there, and have a nice cuppa while you listen to the show this week! Comments? Questions? Those go here, you should leave them for me, n'stuff.

item.title: "Q&As, M&Fs & UFO's? "
item.description: Q's and A's about da show n'stuff, menz'n'wimminz, and unbelievables...all wrapped up in a neat little package. Wanna know what the h-e-double toothpick I'm talking about? Then step right up and have a lil bit of a listen to this episode of 3things! Comments and Questions are ALWAYS appreciated. Leave them here, pweeze.

item.title: 3 Things 4.5
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my little slice of heaven. This week, your host's little heaven consists of a fascinating piece of scientific news, which conveniently ties in to Show #1; a bit of music that'll make you sparkle; one my favorite segments to make - Off With Their Heads- and..... some other stuff. Come on and give it a listen. It'll be great. Don't forget to visit the show-links at the lower right of this page. They are quite fantastic, I promise. As always, your comments are deeply appreciated.

item.title: FoFoo
item.description: Hello, Gentle listeners and any aliens that might be surfing the Earthican Web. Just so you know, today I have Faux Food, Buzzy Brains, and Faboo Fauna to share. Interested? Then come on in and sit a spell... Have something to say? Do it HERE with those linky things just over to the right. Also, THANKS!

item.title: tá trí cinn díobh ann ( there are three of them)
item.description: Happy St. Patrick's Day, y'all! Come and have a seat and share a black-and-tan with me as we listen to the show today. I'll tell ya about St. Patty, himself; and how some people are happier than others; and a little tale of a little magic pen. It's really neat. Don't forget to check the links and leave me a comment. I'd sure appreciate it! Slainte!
item.dc:creator: C. Jenna

I'd sure appreciate it! Slainte!

item.title: Hot Nanners
item.description: Comets, Bananas, Gum... none of these THINGS are quite like the other. Or... ARE they?? Join Jenna and find out! Comments? Questions? Concerns? Leave em all here, on the homepage... lots of ways to do it, all appreciated!

item.title: Cars, Bars and Stars
item.description: Greetings, fellas and gals! Today is a light-hearted 3Things, wherein I tease automakers, poke fun at the whole dating scene, and make a valiant attempt at mind-bogglage. Give a listen and let me know how well I have done, eh? Do that here, however, whenever, by comment box, email, or phone-in line. They all work just fine!

item.title: Buggin' Out
item.description: Episode #29. We got yer basic food groups, yer basic bugs, and yer basic sex and violence. What more could a person ask for? HEY! How about a comment? That would be good. Join us, have a listen, leave a word or two behind you. It is custom. My cats are begging you.

item.title: 3 Stupid Things
item.description: Yes, THREE ... count them, 3 stupid Things. I have them! Ya want them? Then come on in and have a listen. Comments? Suggestions? Compliments, even? Leave them here! Jenna appreciates them all.

item.title: Multiple Of Three
item.description: Would you look at that?? Episode #39 already! Wowsa. Come on in and see what it's all about this week. You might find what you want, you might find what you need... but you WILL find at least THREE THINGS. Comments and emails are most appreciated. Leave them here!
